attributes.action: allow a petition regarding the removal of the option to pay by cheque, to be left as live for a more reasonable amount of time. This should allow other people to sign the petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There hasn't been enough time for people to express their opinion on this subject. The banks should not be allowed to remove a payment method that is vital to a lot of people just because the numbers of cheques written has declined. That is not the point.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
